Description:
Contemporary Living - Entertainer's Dream
First impressions last! An immaculate front garden greets you, upon entering this stunning family home you will be impressed with all it has to offer.
Situated in The Grove Estate close to several shopping precincts including Hunt Club, Springhill, Casey Central, Cranbourne Park and Thompson Parkway shopping centres. Medical centres, schools including Carlisle Park Primary, Casey Grammar & Chisholm Institute, public transport, sporting facilities and other local amenities.
The master suite positioned at the front of the home provides a private, yet light filled space, ensuite with all the modern appointments and built-in robe. The further 2 bedrooms also with built-in robes adjacent to second living area or children's rumpus.
The central entertaining and living area is sure to impress with the fabulous hostess kitchen complete with quality stainless steel double oven, range and dishwasher, stone benches throughout under mount sinks and ample storage.
Entertaining will be a breeze with the indoor/outdoor living design and the convenience of corner stacking sliding doors opening out to the well equipped decked alfresco and bar area. Complete with built-in BBQ connected to mains gas, stone bench tops, under mount sink, ceiling fan and lighting.
The second Living area is an ideal retreat or kids rumpus area with complimentary feature walls. Generous laundry with practical storage rear access and garage entry, with the options of study, home office or 4th bedroom, and main bathroom with stone bench top, recessed towel rails and generous storage.
This meticulously maintained contemporary family home won't disappoint. Filled with features you would expect to find like ducted heating and cooling, multiple wired internet points, ceiling fans, ambient lighting, stone benches throughout, contemporary colour scheme, quality drapes, tinted thermal privacy glass, inbuilt ironing station, alarm system sensor activated entry light, garden shed and much more.
Book your inspection today!
Internal area
179m²

Description:
3 BEDROOMS - LOW MAINTENANCE!
Presenting a fantastic opportunity to own a great property in the heart of Cranbourne with no body corporate. Featuring 3 generous bedrooms with robes, good size living area, ducted heating, split system cooling, hostess kitchen with stainless steel gas cooking, oven & dishwasher along with splashback & plenty of cupboard space, central family bathroom, covered entertainment area with fireplace, carport, and lovely front gardens complete the package. Located within walking distance to public transport, shops, St Peters College and along with park access in the street, this a great position for families. Property is currently leased to a great tenant, the choice is yours to continue or move in yourself. A perfect starter or addition to your portfolio - Contact Daniel today!
Please note : Photo I.D. is required at all inspections.

Description:
A cute house with many benefits...
Located in the heart of Cranbourne, it is within walking distance to all amenities, including Cranbourne Park & Hunt Club Shopping Centre, Cranbourne train Station, Cranbourne Secondary College, Casey Grammar School, quick access to South Gippsland Highway and surrounded by many parks. Featuring:
- Three bedrooms, with separate toilet and bathroom
- Spacious formal living with lot of natural lights
- Split system in lounge area and master bedroom
- Kitchen with 900mm gas cooktop, tiles all around and a wall oven
- Backyard with plenty of space for kids and pets to play around
- Side access for the boat or caravan
- Wooden floor all around the house
- Access to a garden shed in the back yard
A great buy for those who are looking to live in, to invest or to downsize.
Don't delay and call Yogi Patel - 0451 719 161 to book in an inspection.
Photo ID required for all opens.

Description:
RESORT VACATION AT HOME!
CRANBOURNE, Carlisle Park Estate: Looking for a luxurious, sleek, trendy home that matches your personality to the fullest? This one is for you! Located in the very vibrant and multi-cultural Carlisle Park Estate, this home boasts ultra-modern designs with a hint of resort-style features.
Standing on a generously sized land (595 sqm approx.), this home is complete with an aesthetically pleasing, neutral pallet, finished off with sleek lighting fixtures and Tasmanian Oak floor.
The show-stopping, one-of-a-kind kitchen is ideal for trendy individuals. Featuring a unique color scheme, this is a kitchen bound to match your unique personality and style.
Now, we come to the pool. Visible from the living area and the master bedroom, this generously sized pool is sure to attract awe and envy from friends and neighbors! This pool is accompanied by ample, bricked floors, perfect for meals or simply winding down and lazing around. In addition, the ready-built bar allows your home to be the perfect destination for entertaining friends and family.
Main Features of the Property:
- 4 Bedrooms + Study
- Master (Full Ensuite & WIR)
- 3 Living Areas + Meals
- Open Plan Kitchen (Top Quality Appliances)
- Decorative Lights
- High Quality Window Furnishings
- Theatre Room
- Double Car Garage
- Pool
- Gazebo
- Fully Fenced
- Heating: Yes
- Cooling: Yes
- Solar Panels: Yes
- Ducted Vacuum: Yes
- Security Camera:Yes
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 60/90/120 days.
Amazing location, Right in the middle of all amenities:
Springhill Shopping Centre
Hunt Club Shopping Centre
Cranbourne Homemaker Centre
Casey Grammar School
Cranbourne East Secondary College
Cranbourne Carlisle Primary School
Rangebank Primary School
Courtenay Gardens Primary School
Cranbourne Park Primary School
Cranbourne Secondary College
Child Care Centres
The Carlisle Park Vikings Sports Complex
Medical Centre, Public Transport
This family home ticks all the right boxes, so don't waste a minute and give Hardeep Singh a call now to book an inspection.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES.

Description:
Immaculate Family Home!
In the sought after Brookland Greens Estate sits this fantastic family home.
This home has been loved and cared for with no expense spared, featuring 4 spacious bedrooms, 2 living zones, enclosed alfresco and a study.
The master bedroom is of substantial size complete with an ensuite and walk in robe, whilst remaining 3 bedrooms all have built in robes and in close proximity to the family bathroom with separate bath and shower facilities.
The hostess kitchen with quality appliances, ample bench and cupboard space takes pride of place, central to both family and entertaining zones and can truly be considered the heart of this spectacular home.
With 2 spacious living zones, you will have no issues in entertaining, with the formal living room at the front of the house and the large tiled family area looking out to the large outdoor pergola and pool for those with kids, pets and also perfect for keeping friends and family entertained all summer long.
Step outside and be greeted by a nicely manicured front yard which adds to the overall street appeal. The lengthy driveway leads to the remote double lock up garage with internal/rear walkway access as well as rear roller door.
Sensationally located in one of Cranbourne's most prestigious estates surrounded by quality established homes. With the Ranfurlie and Greg Norman golf courses all close by the estate also includes a childcare centre, open parkland, exercise stations, walking tracks, playgrounds and sporting facilities. Local schools and shops are only minutes away!
Privacy: Your entry to this property provides consent to the collection and use of personal information for security purposes. It may also be used to provide you with further information about the property, other properties and services marketed by Eview Group | Casey Estate Agents. Please advise our consultant if you do not wish to receive further information. Our full privacy statement is available at our office or online at www.eview.casey.com.au. This is an advertising brochure only. Eview Casey Estate Agents has prepared this brochure to the instructions of the vendor in order to advertise the property. We have not verified the accuracy of the information contained within. You should not rely on this brochure as proof of the facts stated. Description:
26 BOURKE ROAD, CRANBOURNE An opportunity not to be missed!
Location is the key with this property being close to freeways, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, schools and plenty of reserves. First home buyers and investors need to see this updated property in a highly sought after area. This well maintained home has a modern updated kitchen with a great servery opening to the main living area, gas appliances, dishwasher and plenty of bench & cupboard space, this home features two living spaces, a front lounge area and a rumpus room great for kids to have their own space. All three bedrooms are a great size with two bedrooms with BIR's and ceiling fans, an updated modern bathroom and a European Laundry. Also featuring are evaporative cooling, gas wall heating and downlights. A spacious outdoor area, great to entertain family and friends with a Pergola, timber decking and an inbuilt BBQ, a double garage and easy to maintain garden. Property is currently tenanted, so don't delay move in or invest this superb home will not last long!
Kitchen: Modern kitchen area with plenty of cupboard space, wall oven and dishwasher
Living Area: Spacious front lounge living area with laminate floor boards
Bathroom: Updated bathroom with fantastic modern tiling.
Rumpus Room: Rumpus Room area for the kids to play or that extra getaway space.
Bedroom: Bedroom One, carpet, Bedroom two and three, carpet and BIR and ceiling fans
Double Garage: Double Steel Garage plenty of space for your cars and tools
Pergola: Pergola with built in bbq.
(PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTION)
Goldbank Team welcomes you and looks forward to meeting you at the opens.

GORGEOUS PRIME 695m² CORNER POSITION
(1P3191)
A great opportunity to purchase a solid property in an absolute prime location.
Located within walking distance to schools, Cranbourne Shopping Centre, reserves, and Cranbourne train station, this 3 bedroom plus study/4th bedroom property on a massive 695m² (approx.) corner block with endless scope for future development potential (STCA).

Established gardens to be enjoyed all year round . It must be seen to be fully appreciated, and in this location this property will not last long.
Don't miss out on this Golden opportunity!!

Description:
Grand Family Living
Presenting one of the finest pieces of Real Estate in Cranbourne! This family residence offers a rare opportunity for you to have your own, expertly built, super-sized home that's bound to charm the fussiest buyers. Meticulously maintained and featuring four bedrooms plus bedroom 5/Living, 3 well-appointed bathrooms, three spacious living zones, all sitting on a delightful 601m2 block. Homes like this simply don't come on the market, take advantage of this rare opportunity today!!
The ground floor hosts a sun-filled lounge room which features modern open plan living with a family area and a stunning entertaining kitchen with butler's pantry. The kitchen is adorned with gas cooking, Stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and an abundance of cupboard space. Large undercover entertainment alfresco, which makes for excellent entertaining with family and friends all year long, whatever the weather may be. A double lock up garage with internal/external access + complete side access driveway leading to the rear perfect for boat, caravan or trailer. Floor to ceiling tiled bathroom, laundry and separate powder room complete the lower level.
The upper lever has four jumbo bedrooms which are complete with BIRs, the Master Bedroom is fit for a King and Queen featuring a WIR and large Ensuite.
Extensive list of quality upgrades and inclusions including ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, solar power throughout, laundry Shute and much more.
Nestled in a family friendly neighbourhood close to all desired amenities including walking distance to schools, shops, public transport and easy access to the major arterials, a short 5-minute walk away, offering Woolworths, Aldi and lots of beautiful take away shops/restaurants.
This home is all but ready for you to make it your own

Description:
Neat home with 6mx9m shed!
Convenience & affordability are the two important factors for the savvy buyer, and this well-maintained Brick Veneer home nestled in a quiet location central to Cranbourne's CBD, public transport and with schools, Parks and Sporting facilities within walking distance it ticks all the boxes.
You will be impressed with this neatly presented and well-loved home offering a large 647m2 block with easy relaxed living which is filled with natural light. Featuring 3 Bedrooms with built in robes, Master with walk through robe and semi ensuite.
A well-appointed kitchen with plenty of cupboards, dishwasher, electric oven and bench space overlooking the meals area. A spacious open plan living, and dining room is the perfect place to sit and relax. New ducted heating and split system cooling will keep you comfortable year-round.
A double carport allows through access to a large 6m X 9m shed and workshop at the rear with plenty of space for boat or caravan parking and low maintenance gardens. You will appreciate what this home has to offer, an extremely neat package in a central location
Contact Jason Stirling or Lucas Petrovich to arrange your private inspection!

Description:
LIVING WITH A GATE TO THE PARK
CRANBOURNE: Walking distance to reserve parkland, public transport and schools, this beautiful house is a treasure for investors or first home buyers .Positioned on a low maintenance block of 450sqm approx. this property has 3 bedrooms , master having en-suite and WIRs.
The other 2 bedrooms have built-in robes and a central bathroom. Enjoy family living to its fullest with a spacious living area and a separate meals area.
Main Features of The House:
- 3 spacious bedrooms
- Living Area Plus Separate Dinning
- Master Bedroom (Full Ensuite & WIR)
- Establish gardens at the back and front
- Pargola
- Heating:Yes
- Cooling:Yes
- Rain Water Tank:Yes
- Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
- Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
- Preferred Settlement: 45/60/90 days.
Amazing location has a lot to offer. Well within reach of many enviable amenities:
Rangebank Primary School
St Therese's Primary School
Casey Grammar School
Lyndhurst and Cranbourne Secondary Colleges
Rangebank Pre-School
Cranbourne Station
Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre
Thompsons Parkway Shopping Centre
Casey Aquatic and Recreation Centre
Parks & Grounds
This could be your future Home... give Kuljit Khaira a call on 0433 872 814 to book an inspection time.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters

Description:
CORNER BLOCK - 400m FROM STATION!
Here is an amazing opportunity to secure a property with huge future growth potential and the possibility of development (STCA).
Located close to Cranbourne station and set on a flat corner block of approx 670sqm, this great home features 3 bedrooms including massive master with ensuite featuring large double shower, 2 separate living zones including formal lounge and family room, spacious kitchen with gas cooking, dishwasher & plenty of storage space, ducted heating, air con, formal dining room, new carpet & new floorboards throughout, vaulted ceilings, ceiling fans, family bathroom with spa, spacious laundry, lock up garage, paved outdoor entertainment area & rear access to the private backyard. All located nearby to many amenities such as Cranbourne Park & Hunt Club shops, public transport, schools, major roads & more.
Suiting homebuyers, investors & developers, this one must be inspected to be fully appreciated. Be quick - call Daniel today!
Please note : Photo I.D. is required at all inspections.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to ensure the accuracy of the above information, but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or the agent. Prospective purchasers should make their own inquiries to verify the information contained in this document.
Internal area
173m²

Description:
FAMILY HOME ON LARGE BLOCK WITH SIDE ACCESS
CRANBOURNE CENTRAL - Set in a great spot in Cranbourne sits 8 Wallace Road. This property has all of the benefits of being in a central location but on a big block of 649m2!
From the entry of the home, you are greeted with a cheerful, sunny and generous sized living area with timber floors which give the home beautiful character. The lounge area is complete with a split system, large windows with roller shutters and plenty of space for living.
Continuing on, the kitchen overlooks an equally as bright meals area. A skylight and surrounding windows bring in heaps of light, making the area delightful to cook a family meal in. The neat kitchen has everything you need with lots of cupboard space, breakfast bar and a four gas burner cooktop.
The master bedroom is spacious and airy, featuring a walk in robe with access to the fully appointed main bathroom. The additional 2 bedrooms are good sized, all with built in robes. The property also benefits from a separate laundry with side access.
Stepping outside you will be greeted with a large paved entertainment area with pergola, perfect for year-round entertainment. The backyard at Wallace Road is large enough to store any boys toys as needed, with a substantially sized garage, side access with space for a boat or caravan, a shed plus a fun cubby house with sandpit to keep the kids happy!
To top it all off, this property also has drawings to extend the home to a 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom property as well. No need to get these drawn up yourself! Drawings are available upon request. (STCA)
The property also reaps the benefits of being within close proximity to the James Cook Drive Reserve, providing additional green space in the heart of Cranbourne.
Features include:
Ducted heating
Split system
Solar panels
Massive 649m2 block with side access
Timber floorboards
Roller shutters
Paved entertainment area
Large garage
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Park, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and vendor expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS.

Description:
Modern style and space
Call for a private inspection at a time that suits you.
Entirely in tune with a modern familys demands, this stunning 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home features twin levels of luxury in a super-convenient setting.
Designed with entertaining in mind, enjoy light-filled, open-plan living and dining, a stone-topped kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, and an upstairs retreat.
Comprehensive features include powder rooms on both levels, a remote-controlled garage with internal access, and a low-maintenance garden.
3 large bedrooms, main with WIR, balcony and stunning twin-vanity ensuite, 2 with BIR
Luxurious bathroom with bath and walk-in shower
Separate laundry
Panel heating and split-system heating and cooling
Single remote-controlled garage featuring internal access plus driveway parking
Rainwater tank
Easy Monash Freeway access and bus transport to Frankston
Moments from shopping, schools, restaurants and transport with so much more to come, one inspection will convince you that this is something special!
For more information, please contact Eric Lim today.

Description:
Room For The Whole Family
This great sized four bedroom home, located in a quiet court on a flat block with over 700m2 (approx) on offer, has it all.
The home offers three separate living areas so there's plenty of room to escape, a large central kitchen with a huge amount of bench space and modern stainless steel appliances, hard wearing tiles in all the main traffic areas, all the bedrooms are able to accommodate a queen sized bed and have built in robes and the master bedroom features a walk in robe and a full ensuite. This home has been set up with families in mind. Theres also ducted heating and evaporative cooling so all the seasons are covered.
Leading out from the family room is a massive covered outdoor entertaining area ready for the biggest of gatherings that will be the envy of all your friends. The backyard is big enough for the kids to play in and there is plenty of parkland surrounding this home to walk the dog, kick a footie and/or ride a bike.
This is one very special home, so ring now to arrange an inspection.
